long_description: With a compact design that won't hog space in your campsite, the Coleman Mini High Tech Lantern offers up to 200 hrs. of light with customizable brightness thanks to a reliable, long-lasting LED bulb. Cree(R) LED bulb emits 85 lumens on high and 5 lumens on low; 10 hrs. run time on high, 200 hrs. on low. Intensity dial adjusts brightness. Durable construction is impact-resistant to 3 ft., and lantern also resists rain and splashes. Coleman Mini High Tech Lantern runs on 3 AA batteries (included). Lantern measures 2.25 x 5.75 in.
short_description: With a compact design that won't hog space in your campsite, the Coleman Mini High Tech Lantern offers up to 200 hrs. of light with customizable brightness thanks to a reliable, long-lasting LED bulb.
